title.eng: Please enter amount you want to deposit

description.trans:
AI core môžes získať: 
        - čistením rôznych lokácií
        - Vytváranie pomocou hash procesorov a technického bordelu
        - Prehladávaním nepriateľov vo všetkých lokáciách

You may get AI Cores by: 
        - Scavenge in various locations
        - Crafting with Hash Processors and Tech Scraps
        - Looting from enemies in all locations

description.trans: spracovanie

Global Skip ti umožní preskočiť AFK čakanie a skončiť okanžiťe.

Global Skip allow you to skip the AFK waiting time, and finish it instantly.
    this effect will be applied to all players performing an AFK task

description1.trans: Keďže táto hra vyrába iba jedna osoba, je veľmi ťažké preložiť všetky jazyky správne, ale pracujem na pridávaní ďalších prekladov :)

systemTimeIncorrect.trans: Nepresný čas zariadenia (časový rozdiel: ${diff}). Zabezpečiť správne zobrazenie funkcií hry, ako sú Buff, Time preskočenie a AFK. Synchronizujte čas svojho zariadenia so sieťou a uistite sa, že je váš časový zón nastavený správne
systemTimeIncorrect.eng: Inaccurate device time (time difference: ${diff}). to ensure game features such as buff, time skip and AFK Task display correctly. Please sync your device time with network and ensure your time-zone is set correctly

description.trans: Zabite niektorých nepriateľov a získajte celú sadu položiek, aby ste mohli začať svoju cestu
description.eng: Kill some enemies and get a full set of items for you to start your journey

description.trans:
Vitajte v CyberCode Online, 
         Spoznávanie priateľov s ľuďmi online bude pre vás veľmi užitočné na dokončenie questov Co-op, 
         Choďte do toho, opýtajte sa ľudí online, ak máte akékoľvek otázky :) 
         Pamätajte, že ak spam v chate, budete tlmení moderátormi.
description.eng:
Welcome to CyberCode Online,
        making friends with people online will be very useful for you to complete co-op quests,
        go ahead ask people online if you have got any questions :)
        Remember, if you spam in the chat, you will be muted by moderators.

description.trans:
The level of items you print with Caches are determined by your Printing Rank,
        level up your Printing Rank so you can print higher level items.
        
        You can find Molecular 3D Printer at [Central Hub], use it to print some caches to level up your Printing Rank
description.eng:
The level of itemS you print with Caches are determined by your Printing Rank,
        level up your Printing Rank so you can print higher level items.
        
        You can find Molecular 3D Printer at [Central Hub], use it to print some caches to level up your Printing Rank

description.trans: Otvorte 4 prepravky v Dungeone, aby ste im dali sladké koristi!
description.eng: Open 4 crates in dungeon to get them sweet loots!

description.trans: Môžete predať a kúpiť položky od hráčov na trhu hráča, vyskúšať ich pridaním položky na trh hráča
description.eng: You can sell and purchase items from players in the player market, try it out by adding an item to the player market

description.trans: Dosiahnite úroveň ${level} pre špeciálne darčeky!
description.eng: Reach level ${level} for special gifts!

description.trans: Viac informácií o hre sa môžete pozrieť na našu komunitnú tutoriálovú stránku. Existuje veľa tipov a sprievodcov, ktorí vám pomôžu začať!
description.eng: You can take a look at our community tutorial page to learn more about the game. there are tons of tips and guides to help you get started!

description.trans:
Acquire a Key Fragment from each dungeon located in ${segmentDisplayName}.
                These are used to create the key to the next zone.
                To craft the key, go to Terminal in [HUB]
description.eng:
Acquire 3 different Key Fragments from each dungeons located in ${segmentDisplayName},
                these are used to create the key to next zone.
                To craft the key, go to terminal in [HUB]

abandonConfirm.trans: Ste si istí, že chcete opustiť túto úlohu?
abandonConfirm.eng: Are you sure you want to abandon this quest?

description1.trans: Je nám veľmi ľúto, že sa to stalo, prosím, pochopte, že sme povinní udržiavať bezpečné prostredie pre všetkých hráčov a zabezpečiť, aby každý mohol hrať hru v príjemnom prostredí. Preto musíme stlmiť, keď je to potrebné. Prečítajte si naše pravidlá chatovania z odkazu nižšie, kde nájdete úplné informácie
description1.eng: We are very sorry this happened, please understand we are required to maintain a safe environment for all players and ensure that everyone can play the game in a pleasant environment. Thats why we have to mute when it is needed. please do read our chat rules from the link below for full information

description2.trans: Ak sa domnievate, že to bolo nedorozumenie, kontaktujte moderátora prostredníctvom nášho Discord Channel prepojeného nižšie.
description2.eng: If you believe it was a misunderstanding, please contact the moderator via our discord channel linked below.

description3.trans: Ak by ste chceli nahlásiť moderátora za zneužitie alebo priestupok, môžete osloviť Dexter (vývojár tejto aplikácie) prostredníctvom formulára odvolania nižšie
description3.eng: If you would like to report a moderator for abuse or misconduct, you may reach out to Dexter (the developer of this app) via the appeal form below

description4.trans: Prípadne sa môžete tiež obrátiť na vývojára e -mailom na adrese ching.huang.dexter@gmail.com
description4.eng: Alternatively, you may also contact the developer via email at ching.huang.dexter@gmail.com

description.eng: deals increased damage to Animals gang. receives increased damage from Scavengers gang.

description.eng: Set filters to select which items to sell to the shop.

description.trans:
Commercially used Neural Processing Unit (NPU) that comes with general purpose AI. 
        You can use this to deploy a bot that farms dungeons for you.
description.eng:
Commercially used Neural Processing Unit (NPU). Comes with general purpose AI. 
        You can use this to deploy a farming bot to dungeon for you.

description.trans: Klaster jadra AI obsahuje 1 000 jadier AI. dá sa ľahko zostaviť a rozobrať.
description.eng: AI Core Cluster contains 1000 AI Cores. can be easily assembled and disassembled.

description.trans: A portable energy storage device. Can be used as consumable ammo for your Special Weapons
description.eng: Portable energy storage device, it can be used as consumable ammo for your Special Weapons

description.trans:
A high-tech, miniaturized, one-time use, antimatter energy generator. 
        This item produces enormous amounts of power. You can use this as ammunition for your Destructive Weapon.
description.eng:
High-tech, miniaturized, one-time use, antimatter energy generator. 
        This item produces enormous amounts of power. You can use this as ammunition for your destructive weapon.

description.trans:
Ammunition tech parts commonly found circulating the black market. 
        You can use these to craft ammunition.
description.eng:
Ammunition tech parts, These can be commonly found circulating the black market. 
        You can use these to craft ammunition if you understand how.

description.trans: Military-grade ammunition tech parts commonly used by the government, military, and the elite. Can be used to craft into ammunition.
description.eng: Military grade ammunition tech parts, commonly used by government, military and the elites,can be used to craft into usable Ammo if you have the know-how

description.trans:
Technology scrap from disassembled equipment. This can be reverse engineered to gain printing xp. 
        You can perform reverse engineering in the Job Hub.
description.eng:
Technology scrap from disassembled equipment, this can be reverse engineered to gain printing xp. 
        You can perform reverse engineering in the Job Hub.

description.trans: Do you have a headache? Use Pain Away™ to relieve your pain!
description.eng: Do you have headache? Use Pain Away™ to relieve your pain!

description.trans: An old nano repair bot. Used to repair small tech devices.
description.eng: An old nano repair bot, usually used to repair small tech devices.

description.trans: An old nano medic bot. Inject it to cure any(*conditions apply) injury!
description.eng: Old nano medic bot is used to cure any (*conditions apply) injury!

description.trans: Inject it to cure any (*conditions apply) injury!
description.eng: Inject it to cure any(*conditions apply) injury!

description.trans: Injectable nano machines that are standard issue for military use. Capable of patching injuries while in combat.
description.eng: Injectable nano machines that are standard issue for military use. They are capable of patching injuries while in combat.

description.trans: Injectable nano machines that are used in the military. They are capable of patching injuries while in combat.
description.eng: Injectable nano machines that are standard issue for military use. They're capable of patching injuries while in combat.

description.trans: Pop v tejto kazetovej páske a nechajte sladké zvuky retro syntetického vlny, ktoré vás prenesú do neónového sveta nekonečnej možnosti. S touto groovy podporou budete pripravení prijať akúkoľvek výzvu, ktorú má Cyberpunk Future!

description.trans: Obsahuje fragmenty Advance AI navrhnuté tak, aby pomohlo s modernizáciou zariadení. Pri použití znižuje pravdepodobnosť deštruktívneho zlyhania o ${percent}% (stohovateľné) na ${duration} minúty

A forgotten ancient pouch.

        The meaning of the ancient ominous drawing is unknown, but it is handy to keep some small objects in.
        Increases inventory space when equipped.

description.trans:
Worried Big Brother is spying on you while you browse the cyberspace?
        Does your intercoms always get hacked by malicious attacks?

Worried the Big Brother spying on you while you browse the cyberspace?
        your intercoms always get hacked by malicious attacks?

Prehan, ktorý obsahuje predbežné využitie. 
         Sa dá použiť na porušenie systémov, ako je napríklad dátová pevnosť Shangri-La
description.eng:
A shard that contains advance exploits. 
        Can be used to breach systems such as Shangri-la Data Fortress

description.trans: Šifrovaný kontajner s červenou zelenou dekoráciou a logom „Cybbersanta ™“ na jej strane.
description.eng: An encrypted container with red, green decoration and a 'CyberSanta™' logo on the side of it.

description.trans: Tajomný darček zabalený do šumivého obalu na snehovú vločku. Môžete ho odomknúť iba na [termináli] v decembri.
description.eng: A mystery gift wrapped in sparkling, snowflake-themed packaging. You can only unlock it at the [Terminal] during December.

descriptionv3.trans: A shard that contains advance exploits designed to increase random drop chance of high tier items. Gains additional drop chance of Legendary (${legendaryChance}%) and Epic (${epicChance}%) items when unlocking Legendary containers (Not stackable) for ${time} minute. *IMPORTANT: The buff will only apply when the unlocking process is started while the buff is active*.
descriptionv3.eng: A shard that contains advance exploits designed to increase random drop chance of high tier items. Gains additional drop chance of Legendary (${legendaryChance}%) and Epic (${epicChance}%) items when unlocking Legendary containers (Not stackable) for ${time} minute (Applies to all players). *IMPORTANT: The buff will only apply when the unlocking process is started while the buff is active*.

description.trans: Flash granát, ktorý sa dá použiť na oslepenie nepriateľov. Zvýšenie vašej šance na útek o ${escape}%
description.eng: A flash grenade that can be used to blind enemies. increasing your chance of escape by ${escape}%

description.trans: Vyrezávaná tekvica, ktorá je osvetlená LED vo vnútri. Je to dekoratívne použitie pre Halloween.
description.eng: A carved pumpkin that is lit by a LED inside. It's a decorative item use for of Halloween. You can craft a Locked Legendary Container with 100 of this

description.trans: Zatiaľ čo Shard je aktívny, všetci hráči sa môžu rozhodnúť, že začnú určité úlohy AFK v Boost Mode ™, získavajú ${rewardMult} x odmenu a zároveň zvyšujú náklady a trvanie o ${costMult} x. \ n * Táto položka je stále beta a je predmetom zmeny zostatku, použite okamžite po zakúpení *
description.eng: While shard is active all players can choose to start certain AFK tasks in Boost Mode™, gaining ${rewardMult}x reward while increasing cost and duration by ${costMult}x. \n* This item is still beta and subject to balance change, please use immediately after purchase *

description.trans: Červená obálka so zlatou digitálnou pečaťou. Vyzerá to, že obsahuje nejaký druh meny
description.eng: A red envelope with a golden digital seal on it. looks like it contains some sort of currency

description.trans: Zlatá minca s gravírovaním draka na ňom. Fyzická mena je veľmi zriedkavá, keď sa v dnešnej dobe uvidí
description.eng: A golden coin with a engraving of a dragon on it. physical currency is very rare to see these days, should be able to buy something good with it in the market district

description.trans: Tieto knedle sú na rozdiel od iných. Vyrobené z lásky a starostlivosti Yen, tieto chutné vrecká dobroty sú naplnené najlepšími ingredienciami a varí sa k dokonalosti
description.eng: These dumplings are unlike any other. Made with love and care by Yen, these delicious pockets of goodness are filled with the finest ingredients and cooked to perfection.\n recover ${percent}% health upon consumption

description.trans: Vynikajúci tekvicový koláč. Tento koláč má nad ním veľké množstvo hrubého vanilkového krému, chutné!
description.eng: A delicious pumpkin pie. this pie has big load of thick vanilla cream over it, delicious!\nrecover ${percent}% health upon consumption

description.trans: Šťavnaté jablko pokryté hrubou vrstvou karamelu. Dokonalá kombinácia sladkého a kyslého.\nZvyšuje AFK EXP a všetky BTC získané o ${percent}% na ${minutes} minút
description.eng: A juicy apple covered in a thick layer of caramel. the perfect combination of sweet and sour.\n Increases AFK EXP and all BTC gained by ${percent}% for ${minutes} minutes

description.trans: lepkavý a sladký ryžový koláč je tradičné lunárne novoročné jedlo a verí sa, že prináša šťastie a prosperitu
description.eng: sticky and sweet rice cake is a traditional Lunar New Year food and is believed to bring good luck and prosperity.\n recover ${percent}% shield upon consumption

description.trans: Vyrobené z lásky a starostlivosti Yen. Vypracované a výživné jedlo, ktoré poskytne hráčovi -${percent}% poškodenie, ktoré sa pri konzumácii uplatňovalo 20 minút. Yen's Sushi je ideálny na riešenie ťažkých výziev a dobývaní ťažkých nepriateľov, je nevyhnutnosťou - mať pre každého dobrodruha.
description.eng: Made with love and care by Yen. delicious and nourishing meal that will grant the player -${percent}% damage taken for 20 minutes when eaten. Perfect for tackling tough challenges and conquering difficult foes, Yen\'s sushi is a must - have for any adventurer.

description.trans: Použite Slanc Connector na pripojenie Slanc k globálnemu rozhovoru na ${minute} minút
description.eng: Use SLANC Connector to connect SLANC to global chat for ${minute} minutes

description.trans: Token, ktorý sa dá použiť na výmenu položiek
description.eng: A token that can be used to exchange items

description.trans: Klaster technikového šrotu obsahuje 1 000 technologických kúskov, ktoré sa dá použiť na ľahké uloženie a obchodovanie
description.eng: A Tech Scrap Cluster contains 1000 Tech Scraps, can be used to easily store and trade

description.trans: Prepravka, ktorá obsahuje náhodné vybavenie alebo iné korisť
description.eng: A crate that contains a random equipments or other loots

description.trans: Po nasadení znížte čas AFK o ${afkPercent}%, zvýšené BTC získané o ${btcPercent}%, zvýšenie EXP získané o ${expPercent}%\ nand Banner sa zobrazí na obrazovke chatu s vaším menom, čo znamená, že ste nasadili buff
description.eng: When deployed, reduce AFK time by ${afkPercent}%, increased BTC gained by ${btcPercent}%, increase EXP gained by ${expPercent}%\nAnd a banner will be shown in chat screen with your name indicating that you have deployed the buff

announcement.trans: 🎉its Party Time! 🥳, Znížte čas AFK o ${afkPercent}%, zvýšené BTC získané o ${btcPercent}%, zvýšenie exp získaného o ${expPercent}%
announcement.eng: 🎉Its Party Time!🥳, reduce AFK time by ${afkPercent}%, increased BTC gained by ${btcPercent}%, increase EXP gained by ${expPercent}%

description.trans: Lahodná pražená morka, keď sa konzumuje, zvýšenie EXP prijaté v úlohách AFK o ${percent}%
description.eng: A delicious roasted turkey, when consumed increases EXP received in AFK tasks by ${percent}%

description.trans: Hustý, dusený puding so sušeným ovocím, orechmi a často priviazanými alkoholom, keď sa konzumuje zvýšenie EXP prijaté v úlohách AFK o ${percent}%
description.eng: A dense, steamed pudding with dried fruits, nuts, and often laced with alcohol, when consumed increases EXP received in AFK tasks by ${percent}%.\nThis item can only be used during December

error.trans: Táto položka je k dispozícii iba počas vianočných podujatí
error.eng: This item is only available during Christmas Event

description.trans: Kredit, ktorý môžeš použiť na výmenu predmetov pre domáce zvieratá v Neonovej Svätyne Labky
description.eng: A credit that can be used to exchange pet items at Neon Paw Sanctuary

description.trans: Zlúčte ${amount} tohto, aby ste získali Pas na Adopciu Útočiska, ktorý môžete použiť na adopciu nového maznáčika
description.eng: Combine ${amount} of this to get a Sanctuary Adoption Pass, and it can be used to adopt a new pet

description.trans: Kombinuj ${amount} z toho, aby si získal/a Pas na adopciu do útočiska, ktorý môžeš použiť na adopciu nového miláčika
description.eng: A pass that can be used to adopt a pet from Neon Paw Sanctuary

description.trans: "Elektrovlákno Kúsky™ obsahujú zložitú zmes vlákien, ktoré vedú a ukladajú energiu, posilňujúc tak vytrvalosť a silu tvojho maznáčika pre dlhšie výpravy v kybernetickej divočine."
description.eng: "ElectroFiber Bites™ contain a complex blend of fibers that conduct and store energy, boosting your pet's stamina and power for longer expeditions in the cyber wilderness."

description.trans: "Predstavujeme NanoNibble loptičku - zázrak herného technologického dizajnu určený pre čistú radosť. Každá loptička sa rozžiari fascinujúcimi vzormi pri najmenšom dotyku, zabezpečujúc, že váš miláčik je dôkladne zabávaný. Po seansone bezprecedentnej zábavy sa loptička inteligentne rozloží na neškodné, ekologické častice, nezanechávajúc žiadny neporiadok. Ideálne pre jedinečnú dobrodružnú digitálnu spoločnosť, je to ultimátny zážitok z hrania, ktorý sa pekne vytratí, ušetrí vám upratovanie."
description.eng: "Introducing the NanoNibble Ball – a marvel of playtime technology designed for sheer joy. Each ball lights up with mesmerizing patterns at the slightest touch, ensuring your pet is thoroughly entertained. After a session of unprecedented fun, the ball smartly deconstructs into harmless, eco-friendly particles, leaving no mess behind. Perfect for a single, unforgettable adventure in digital companionship, it’s the ultimate playtime experience that neatly disappears, sparing you the cleanup."

description.trans: FurFlush sprej: Elegantný kanister s nápisom „Okamžite čisté, okamžite preč.“ Rýchly sprej premení tvoje špinavé zvieratko na žiarivého - žiadne oplachovanie, žiadny neporiadok, len puf! Ideálne pre tie 'ups' momenty pred cyber stretnutím. Pozor: Môže spôsobiť neočakávaný štýl tvojho miláčika. Jednorazová magická pomoc pre spoločníka mestského objavovateľa. Po použití zmizne, nezanecháva žiadne stopy okrem ohromujúceho zvieratka.
description.eng: FurFlush Spray: The sleek canister reads 'Instant Clean, Instant Gone.' A quick spritz turns your grimy pet gleaming—no rinse, no mess, just poof! Perfect for those 'oops' moments before a cyber meet-up. Caution: May lead to unexpected pet swagger. Single-use magic for the urban explorer's companion. Disappears after use, leaving no evidence except a dazzling pet.

description.trans: Keď sa tvoje zvieratko cíti mizerne alebo sa mu jednoducho nedarí, toto je tá správna voľba. Zvládne všetko od nádchy po modroty z 'zjedol som niečo divné'. Pozor na vedľajšie účinky: môže spôsobiť náhle ocenenie tvojho varenia a nárast útokov na maznanie. Pretože niekedy je najlepším liekom trocha smiechu... a PawfectCure.
description.eng: When your pet's feeling under the weather, or just plain off, this is the go-to. It tackles everything from the sniffles to the 'I ate something weird' blues. Beware of side effects: may cause a sudden appreciation for your cooking and an increase in snuggle attacks. Because sometimes, the best remedy is a little laughter... and PawfectCure.

description.trans: Krásna mušľa, ktorá sa dá použiť na výmenu predmetov
description.eng: A beautiful seashell that can be used to exchange items

description.trans: Osviežujúci nápoj, ktorý môže zvýšiť získané EXP v AFK úlohách o ${percent}%. \nTento predmet môže byť použitý iba počas ${event} udalosti
description.eng: A refreshing soda that can be used to increase EXP received in AFK tasks by ${percent}%.\nThis item can only be used during ${event} event

notAvailableError.trans: Tento predmet je k dispozícii iba počas Letného podujatia
notAvailableError.eng: This item is only available during Summer Event

description.trans: Môže byť použitý s [Replikačnou konzolou] v dungeonoch na získanie náhodných odmien.
description.eng: Can be used with the [Replication Console] in dungeons to receive random rewards.

description.trans: A shard that contains someone's memories and experiences. If used, you may gain ${levelName} experience from this
description.eng: A shard that contains someone's memory and experience. If used you may gain ${levelName} experience from this

description.trans:
Secret key Fragment. Used to brute-force a secret key.
                                Use the Terminal at City Center [Hub] to brute-force a ${segmentDisplayName} secret key.
                                You can acquire each of the 3 required keys in each dungeon (both normal and challenge).
                                When you have acquired the 3 keys, you may use Terminal to brute-force (Craft) the key to the next area
description.eng:
A secret key Fragment used to brute-force a secret key.
                                Use the Terminal at city center [Hub] to brute-force a ${segmentDisplayName} secret key.
                                You can acquire each of the 3 required keys in each dungeon (both normal or challenge),
                                when you acquired 3 keys, you may use Terminal to brute-force (Craft) a key to the next area

description.trans:
A ${typeName} cache contains information used for Molecular 3D Printing. 
                    You can create a ${typeName} with the [Molecular 3d Printer] at [Central Hub].
                    
                    Pro tip: The level of the item you get from printing is determined by your Printing Rank,
                    so always print the trash ones first, as they cost less and are useful to level up your Printing Rank
description.eng:
A ${typeName} cache contains information used for Molecular 3D Printing, 
                    You can create a ${typeName} with the [Molecular 3d Printer] at [Central Hub].
                    
                    Pro tip: The level of item you get from printing is determined by your Printing Rank,
                    so always print the trash ones first, as they cost less and useful to level up your Printing Rank

description.trans:
[Central Hub]
        One of the busiest cities on the continent. Here you can find all sorts of people from around the globe.
description.eng:
[Central Hub]
        One of the busiest cities in the continent. Here you can find all sorts of people from around the globe.

description.trans: Choďte na centrálnu stanicu Hyper Train
description.eng: Go to Hyper Train Central Station

tut.trans: Začnite svoje dobrodružstvo pre Epic Loot tu
tut.eng: Start your adventure for epic loot here

tut.trans: Môžete dokončiť pracovné miesta AFK, aby ste zvýšili svoje zručnosti tu
tut.eng: You can complete AFK jobs to increase your skills here

tut.trans: Tu môžete predať alebo kúpiť predmety od iných hráčov
tut.eng: You can sell or buy items from other players here

description.trans:
[Job Hub]
        Where many shops and businesses reside. It is the perfect location to try out your skills.
description.eng:
[Job Hub]
        Here are many shops and businesses reside. The perfect location to hone and refine your skills.

description.trans:
[Player Market]
        The famous street market in Shangri-La where loads of stalls fill the street.
        Maybe you can find something you need or set up shop yourself.
description.eng:
[Player Market]
        The famous market street in Shangri-La. Loads of market stalls fill the street.

description.trans:
[Adventure]
        Using the hyperloop, you can travel at super speed across the continent with ease.
description.eng:
[Adventure]
        Using the hyperloop, you can travel at supersonic speed across the continent with ease.

description.trans:
[Gang]
        The headquarters for you and your gang members to plan and execute the next operation
description.eng:
[Gang]
        The headquarters for you and your gang members to plan and execute your next operation

cantEnterError.trans: Ak chcete vstúpiť do tejto oblasti, musíte sa pripojiť k gangu
cantEnterError.eng: You need to join a gang to enter this area

name.trans: Vráť sa do centra mesta Shangri-La

description.trans:
[Byt]
        Tvoj útulný byt v meste. Tvoje zvieratá ťa už čakajú doma.
description.eng:
[Apartment]
        Your cozy apartment in the city. your pets are waiting for you to come home.

cantEnterError.trans: Na prenájom bytov potrebuješ mať aspoň úroveň ${level}
cantEnterError.eng: You need to be at least level ${level} to rent an apartment

description.trans:
[Coast]  
        Krásne pobrežie len pár kilometrov od centra mesta. Ideálne miesto na oddych a vychutnanie si morského vánku.
description.eng:
[Coast]
        The beautiful coast a few kilometers away of downtown. The perfect place to relax and enjoy the sea breeze.

name.trans: Vráťte sa do centra mesta Shangri-La

cantEnterError.trans: Musíš mať aspoň úroveň ${level}, aby si mohol získať prístup k Kryštálovým pieskom
cantEnterError.eng: You need to be at least level ${level} to access the Crystal Sands

description.trans: Vráťte sa na ${mainHubName}
description.eng: Return to ${mainHubName}

description.trans: Vráťte sa na ${segmentStationName}
description.eng: return to ${segmentStationName}

description.trans: Vráťte sa na Hyper Train Station
description.eng: Return to Hyper Train Station

description.trans: Úroveň ${segment} na ${segmentMaxLevel}
description.eng: Level ${segment} to ${segmentMaxLevel}

description.trans:
Gather all 3 unique Key Fragments from Dungeons in the previous station, 
                    then go to [Terminal] at City Center [Hub] to brute-force (Craft) the key required to unlock this area
description.eng:
Gather all 3 different Key Fragments from Dungeons in each 3 zones in previous station, 
                    then go to [Terminal] at City Center [Hub] to brute-force (Craft) the key required to unlock this area

tut.trans: Start with the level 1 to 10 area
Continue here to fight a level 1 enemy
tut.eng: Continue here to fight level 1 enemy

description.trans: Prejdite na ${zoneName}
description.eng: Go to ${zoneName}

trans: Do you want to buy Units, or use your Units?
Thanks for checking the store out.
Did you know that the S.A.T. was in a developmental phase for a long time?
We just got a new stock of S.A.T.'s. Interested in getting one?
Welcome to the Arasaka Unit Exchange.
Did you know the current S.A.T.'s are actually version 2.0?
Remember: Rare S.A.T.'s and Normal grade S.A.T.'s arent compatible.
BTC? No, we only deal in UNITs here.
Do you know Lexi from the bank? We went to school together.
Have you visited Doc at Trinoky Mart? You don't look too well.
Most folks around here are nice. I stress most.
Been anywhere interesting lately? I just got back from Neo-Japan.
There's nothing like a hot cup of tea on a cold day, won't you agree?
We got more S.A.T.'s on the way. Want to take a look in the mean time?
Global S.A.T.'s signals tend to go up at random. Be sure to pay attention.
My radio jammed up pretty bad the other day. Turns out it was the 3Helix Network.
You want to really make everyone's day? Buy some units and use 'em for EXP boosts!
Buying units and spending them benefits everyone, you know?
A game that isn't pay to win. Fancy that!
Everyone gets something out of your purchase, even the dev!
Noise complaint?
eng: Do you want to buy Units, or use your Units?

canAccessError.trans: You need to be at least level 5 to access unit exchange
canAccessError.eng: You need to be at least level 3 to access unit exchange

tut.trans: Tu si môžete kúpiť globálne buffové položky tu
tut.eng: You can purchase global buff items here

trans: Hi! Donate to get cosmetic perks and to help support Free-to-Win games like this one!
Have you considered making a monthly donation?
Nice to see you, what is it you require?
Want to stand out from the crowd? Maybe grab a subscription.
I can apply a profile photo to your profile if you buy a subscription. What do you say?
Want a colorful border for online chatting? Why don't you subscribe?
The cost of the lowest subscription is only a cup of coffee. Think you could spare me some caffeine?
Donating makes you pretty and helps the development of the game.
Want to make a scene? Make yourself shine brighter than the sun with a new look!
I can't offer you any pay-to-win content, but I can definitely make you look dazzling!
Colorful is the new cool! I can give you a color... for a price.
You like pictures, I like pictures, we all like pictures. For a price, anyone can have one!
Donations keep the game development going. I buy coffee with it so I can keep on making content!
Coding is exhausting. A good coffee is only 2 dollars!
With a donation, you can help support the game and look cool doing it! Color, pictures, and animations!
Money makes the world go 'round! You donating means I can make this a full time job!
Fancy a cool profile, do ye?
You look like a person who knows their style! Tell you what, I'll give you style for a price.
Beauty tip #1: Color is half of what makes the world so amazing!
eng: Hi! Donate to get cosmetic perks and to help support Free-to-Win games like this one!

canAccessError.trans: You need to be at least level 5 to access the cosmetic merchant
canAccessError.eng: You need to be at least level 3 to access cosmetic merchant

tut.trans: If you like the game, please consider donating :)
tut.eng: If you liked the game, please consider donation :)

trans: I'll print whatever you want if you have the cache!
Show me the cache and I will show you the result!
Please, tell me you have some Epic cache with you.
Welcome. I hope you are a customer...
If you got cache, I can print 'em!
So glad we no longer use ink; I can wear my best clothes to work.
Wonder why we never use our replicators to print food.
Tea, Earl Grey, hot. Maybe even bubble tea. 😋
Lemme see that cache of yours.
Live long and prosper. 🖖
I get excited every time I see a customer; maybe they have an Epic!
I feel lonely at times. One day I'll buy a love bot or android to keep me company.
Computers make excellent and efficient servants, but I have no wish to serve under them.
Don't worry, we won't run out of ink.
Sometimes I wonder what the outside world looks like. Will you tell me about it when you become famous?
Just keep printing, just keep printing.
I'm stuck here, but you're not. Win the war for me with your new gear!
I'll take your cache; you'll take the gear!
That new gear looks nice on you!
I wish someone would print me some legs! I'd love to see what's outside of this room...
I can print guns, yet I can't print myself a set of arms to greet you. Funny how that works...
If you fancy yourself a new getup then bring me the cache. I'll make your dreams come true.
I keep wondering who gets knocked out for you all to have so much cache.
I only make cheesy puns because no one will print me some legs so I can find something better to do.
I'm just a printer, but what I can make will help you get more cache.
I heard that Bank of Arasaka is a good place to store caches if you can't afford to print them yet.
The more gear I print, the more data I have. I get better at printing every day!
Can you print me a coffee? All this printing is exhausting.
Which one do you choose: Laser or Inkjet?
You're not here to print lewd images again, are you?
Print a duck
Please tell me you have some White Epic cache with you.
Just ran outta color ink. Hope ya like grayscale!
Why haven't I printed a copy of myself yet?
Sorry buddy, no free prints!
Good thing I can't print Bitcoin.
D-Don't print something stupid again, p-please.
It took me an extra microsecond to boot today.
Printing makes me happy!
🎵 I'm just a lonely printer~ 🎶 No one will print me a friend~ 🎵
Please stop trying to print pizzas.  The sauce clogs the machine nozzles.
eng: I'll print whatever you want if you have the cache!

tut.trans: You can use your acquired Caches to print new equipment here
tut.eng: You can use your Cache to print new equipment here

trans: You will find the best gear here, trust me.
I can help you if you give me some BitCoin.
I can repair your equipment... for a price.
What do you want, stranger?
Check out what I have scavenged today.
Won't find anything better around these parts.
Have a look at what I've got today.
Fresh wares plundered from the wasteland.
What can I get you today?
Buy something already. I haven't got all day.
You break it, you buy it. Global policy.
Interested in anything we got today?
Welcome to my shop. Have a look around.
Can I help you find something, stranger?
Quality weapons only at this Smithy.
Care to buy one to protect yourself?
The finest weapon smith in Shangri-La at your service.
It's dangerous to go alone.... nevermind.
I was an adventurer like you. Until I established this shop.
No returns or exchanges. What you pay is what you get.
Haven't had enough of me yet, have ya?
The finest weapons and armor.
Hmm... guns, helmets, etc. Pretty much anything to suit your needs.
Looking to protect yourself or deal some damage?
Oh? A bit of this and a bit of that.
Trinkets, odds-and-ends. You know... That sort of thing.
Some may call this junk. Me? I call it treasure.
Have you ever met the Worldslayer?
Tell the President I said hi!
I wonder what Lucille's up to...
Don't just window-shop. Buy something!
Anything in particular that you're looking for?
You look like you know a bargain when you see one!
I used to be an adventurer like you, but then I took a bullet to the knee
LEDs, ropes, explosives. You want it? It's yours, my friend. As long as you have enough Bitcoin.
I always collect the finest blasters I can.
Nice weapon you've got there. Compensating for something?
I once saw someone kill three men in a bar... with a pencil.
Welcome, Baba Yaga.
The Boogeyman?!
eng: You will find the best gear here, trust me.

trans: I'll help you to progress to the next area!
I can tap on the knowledge of the whole world... and yet I'm treated as a cookbook.
My daughter's name is not Mithra! Stop making fun of her!
Are you prepared?
The key is nothing without the container.
Which weighs more, traveller? Your guns, or your past?
The key above all things... except a good drink.
One key, one purpose.
eng: I'll help you to progress to the next area!

tut.trans:
To progress to the next area, you need to get Secret Key Fragments from dungeons 
        and use the Terminal to Brute Force a key for the next area
tut.eng:
To progress to the next area, you need to get Secret Key Fragments from dungeons, 
        and use the Terminal to Brute Force the key for next area

canAccessError.trans: Na prístup k terminálu musíte byť aspoň úrovňou 5
canAccessError.eng: You need to be at least level 5 to access terminal

description.trans: This is your personal computer. Although a little outdated, it can get the job done with enough patience
description.eng: Your personal computer, although it's a little outdated, it can get the job done with enough patience

trans: Hey kid... Come check out my goods.
Hurting? You've come to the right place.
We've got the cheap stuff and the good stuff, kid.
Have you heard about the street angel?
Welcome to Trinoky Mart. You can call me Doc.
We are open 24/7. Unless we aren't.
Don't cause any trouble and don't bring any trouble.
Try to steal anything and I will have a new mannequin.
The least you could do is stop bleeding before you come in.
No refunds and no exchanges. I don't run a charity here.
Hey kid. How are you today?
Don't stop at Grade 7, or else you'll be slaving away here forever like me.
The finest medical supply mart in all of Shangri-La.
SLPD causing a racket again. I hope the council puts them in their place.
Hey kid, ever heard of The 3Helix Network?
Hey kid, ever run into anyone called the Worldslayer?
Did you hear about the restaurant on the moon? Great food but no atmosphere!
A cheese factory exploded in France. There was da brie everywhere!
Geology rocks but Geography is where it’s at!
I hate how funerals are always at 9 a.m. I’m not really a mourning person.
Why did Adele cross the road? To say hello from the other side.
I don’t trust stairs. They’re always up to something.
What did the sushi say to the bee? Wasabee!
The past, the present, and the future walk into a bar. It was tense!
Why should you never trust a train? They have loco motives.
I was wondering why the ball was getting bigger. Then it hit me.
I used to work in a shoe-recycling shop. It was sole destroying!
Come to Quark's! Quark's is fun! Come right now – and don't walk – run!
I've got the best gear you'll find anywhere!
I used to collect colored Legendary Special Weapon, but now everything's just white
The changing rooms are over there…
Let's close the deal before I wet myself!
Please take a look! We surely have something that tickles your fancy...
eng: Hey kid... Come check out my goods.

trans: Welcome. What can I store for you?
Hello. This is the safest place for your most precious items.
Lucky you! Here your items are in the safest place.
Welcome. Do you have something to deposit?
Welcome to the Shangri-La branch. How can I help you today?
I lift things up and put them down. Kidding, but also, not really.
Bank of Arasaka for all your banking needs.
Welcome. What service are you using today?
24/7 for all your banking needs.
This is the most secure place in the city.
Hello there. My name is Lexi. What can I do for you?
Tellers to the left. Deposit stations to the right.
Thanks for visting today. Need any favors?
Not you again... What do you want?
I trust you're not planning any trouble. What can I do for you, friend?
Look over there. You'll see that Misaki offers the best interest loans, if that interests you.
Ever run into an adventuring nomad named Finel?
Our bank is the most secure in the world. Nevermind the only one...
Would you also like to open a savings account?
You need to deposit one White Legendary Special Weapon to open a savings account.
Alpha was just here asking about any epics in your locker!
There's a problem with your ID. Please pay 1 BTC.
eng: Welcome. What can I store for you?

canAccessError.trans: You need to be at least level 5 to access the bank
canAccessError.eng: You need to be at least level 5 to access bank

trans: Insert a Calibration Core into the machine, and I shall help you calibrate any of your equipment.
I'll help you calibrate your equipment, but it ain't my problem if it's destroyed in the process.
My eyes are up here, bud—and so's my gun.
You feelin' lucky? Go ahead and give the machine a try.
All sales are final, all calibration is done at your own risk, and if you wanna take it up with a manager... you're lookin' at her.
Name's Kamiko. That beauty over there is Cali. She's a bit... temperamental.
Your gear's looking a little... well, it could be better. I can help you with that.
It'll take a little while for Cali over here to decrypt the core you brought.
Once you pop in the calibration core, it'll take... eh, 30 minutes or so. You can wait here, but I'd really prefer if you didn't.
No, we don't sell calibration cores here. I provide the machine, you provide the cores. That's how things work here.
Is there a chance that Cali will shred your gear? Sure. But is it worth the gamble? Definitely.
What'll you be powering up today?
Time to calibrate some gear!
eng: Insert a Calibration Core into the machine, and I shall help you calibrate any of your equipment.

canAccessError.trans: Na prístup k kalibračnej stanici musíte byť aspoň úrovňou 10
canAccessError.eng: You need to be at least level 10 to access Calibration Station

trans: I can get you anything you could think of.
Let's make a trade.
You want it, I got it.
So, whaddaya say? Up for a little exchange?
Isn't it time you traded up?
Your money's only so good here. Let's see what else you got.
Welcome to my humble swap shop.
Let's have a look at what you brought in.
This ain't your average shop.
What've you got for me?
Pouches and packs for both fannies and backs!
I'm looking for quantity over quality.
Well? You got trades or not?
Isn't every bag a bag of holding?
Looks like you could use some more space to store stuff.
Name's Lee. As in 'exact-lee' who you needed to see.
Aren't you tired of lugging all your stuff around like that?
Seems like someone needs a new backpack.
If you love it, bag it!
Your pockets seem full. I could help you lighten that load.
How can you fight when your arms are so full of stuff?
You know, you don't have to carry everything you own in your pockets.
Here's the deal: You gimme your old bags, I give you a new bag.
The way you're walking makes me think you're overencumbered.
I'm who you talk to when you wanna secure the bag. Or the backpack.
eng: Hey kid, I'm Lee, You know, you don't have to carry everything you own in your pockets.

description.trans: A family-run trading shop that lets you trade with scavenged goods.
description.eng: A family run trading shop that lets you trade with what they have found while scavenging

canAccessError.trans: Na prístup k obchodníkovi musíte byť aspoň úroveň 10
canAccessError.eng: You need to be at least level 10 to access merchant

trans: Hey kid, wanna make some quick bucks?
eng: Hey kid, wanna make some quick bucks?

tut.trans: Tu môžete predať nadbytočné vybavenie za vyššiu cenu
tut.eng: You can sell excessive equipment caches here for higher price

trans: Welcome, our family is always excited to help you find the perfect tech gear.
eng: Welcome, our family is always excited to help you find the perfect tech gear.

trans: Life is tough, but you're tougher. Keep fighting.
Stay strong, stay punk, and stay alive.
Remember, your worth is not defined by your struggles.
Don't let the system bring you down, rise up and rebel.
Stay connected to your inner self, and disconnect from the noise.
Stay online, stay strong, and stay true to yourself.
eng: Life is tough, but you're tougher. Keep fighting.
Stay strong, stay punk, and stay alive.
Remember, your worth is not defined by your struggles.
Don't let the system bring you down, rise up and rebel.
Stay connected to your inner self, and disconnect from the noise.
Stay online, stay strong, and stay true to yourself.

trans: Pumpkin is my source of power!
Check out my pumpkin costume!
Hmmmm, I wonder what's inside this pumpkin...
Give me your pumpkin, and I'll give you a treat!
eng: Pumpkin is my source of power!
Check out my pumpkin costume!
Hmmmm, I wonder what's inside this pumpkin...
Give me your pumpkin, and I'll give you a treat!

trans: Hey, choom! Neon Paws is for the brave. These sprites need your daily grind. Ready to dive in?
Lookin' sharp, netrunner! Here, pets are more than code, they need your daily hack to thrive.
What's up, street samurai? Partner with a survivor. Without your daily deeds, they're zeroed.
Edge runner, eh? This is where tech meets heart. Ignore them, and they vanish into the net. Daily care, got it?
Cyberdeck in hand, heart on sleeve? Our critters need that daily touch or they'll fade into the static.
eng: Hey, choom! Neon Paws is for the brave. These sprites need your daily grind. Ready to dive in?
Lookin' sharp, netrunner! Here, pets are more than code, they need your daily hack to thrive.
What's up, street samurai? Partner with a survivor. Without your daily deeds, they're zeroed.
Edge runner, eh? This is where tech meets heart. Ignore them, and they vanish into the net. Daily care, got it?
Cyberdeck in hand, heart on sleeve? Our critters need that daily touch or they'll fade into the static.

trans: Hey choom, ready to chip in for the next 24-hour global party? We're just a few units short!
Ready to make an impact? Your contribution could launch the biggest party on the grid!
Looking to start the party? We're pooling funds now for a round-the-clock celebration.
If you’re aiming to see the city light up, help us fill the party meter. Every bit counts!
Hey, choomba! Here to plan another blockbuster event? Let's dive in!
eng: Hey choom, ready to chip in for the next 24-hour global party? We're just a few units short!
Ready to make an impact? Your contribution could launch the biggest party on the grid!
Looking to start the party? We're pooling funds now for a round-the-clock celebration.
If you’re aiming to see the city light up, help us fill the party meter. Every bit counts!
Hey, choomba! Here to plan another blockbuster event? Let's dive in!

canAccessError.trans: Musíš mať aspoň úroveň 10, aby si sa dostal do Partyline Pub-u
canAccessError.eng: You need to be at least level 10 to access partyline pub

trans: Hey, beautiful. Wanna swap those seashells for something refreshing? I’ve got just the fix
Look who just jacked in. Trade those seashells with me, and I’ll give you something to remember.
Thirsty, choom? Trade those seashells for an ice-cold soda pop that’ll knock your socks off!
eng: Hey, beautiful. Wanna swap those seashells for something refreshing? I’ve got just the fix
Look who just jacked in. Trade those seashells with me, and I’ll give you something to remember.
Thirsty, choom? Trade those seashells for an ice-cold soda pop that’ll knock your socks off!

description.trans: Fully-automated recycler, capable of recycling items to their basic scrap form
description.eng: Fully automated recycler, capable of recycling items to their basic scrap form

description.trans: Improve your Printing Rank without sacrificing tech scrap, helping to increase the level of your prints.
description.eng: Improve Printing Rank without sacrificing tech scrap, this may help to increase the level of your prints.

description.trans: Stiahnite si užitočné údaje z kliniky miestneho tela, aby ste vytvorili kvalitnejšie lekárske roboty a bezpilotné lietadlá.
description.eng: Download useful data from a local body mod clinic to craft higher quality medical bots and drones.

description.trans: Tinker with ammunition to find more effective ways of crafting it.
description.eng: Tinker with ammunition, to find more effective ways of crafting it.

description.trans:
Reverse engineer tech scrap to improve your Printing Rank. 
        You’ll need to sacrifice some of your tech scrap.
description.eng:
Reverse engineer tech scrap to improve your Print Rank. 
        You’ll need to sacrifice some of your tech scrap.

description.trans: Engaging in crypto mining will earn you Bitcoins. However, due to the intense use of the Hash Processors, the Quantum Processing Unit - otherwise known as the QPU - will often burn out.
description.eng: Engaging in crypto mining will earn you Bitcoins, however due to the intense use of the Hash Processors, the Quantum Processing Unit, otherwise known as the QPU, will often burn out.

description.trans: Pomôžte zhromažďovať a spravovať potrebné zdroje pre váš gang
description.eng: Help gather and manage needed resources for your gang

description.trans: Pomôžte posilniť a vytvoriť väčšiu kontrolu nad mestom Shangri-La.
description.eng: Help reinforce and establish greater control of Shangri-la city.

description.trans: Decrypt the memory shard you found to retrieve useful intel
description.eng: Decrypt a memory shard to retrieve useful intel.

description.trans:
Konnichiwa!! ^___^
        Come play the MEGA Pachinko with the chance to win HUGE EPIC rewards!

desc1.trans: Získajte až ${percent}% zľavu na príspevky k globálnym buffom počas trvania akcie, začínajúc prvými ${contributors} prispievateľmi s ${percent}%
desc1.eng: Get up to ${percent}% off on contribution to global buffs during event period, starting first ${contributors} contributors with ${percent}%

desc2v2.trans: Zbieraj ${itemName} na výmenu za odmeny v ${npcLocation}. S ${npc} môžeš zbierať ${itemName} z prehľadávania, AFK bot farmy a z dungeónových truhlíc
desc2v2.eng: Collect ${itemName} to exchange for rewards at ${npcLocation} with ${npc}, you can collect ${itemName} from scavenging, AFK bot farm and dungeon crates

title.trans: Letná fiesta: Nenechajte si to ujsť!

desc1.trans: Až ${percent}% zľava na príspevky k globálnym buffom!
desc1.eng: Up to ${percent}% off on contribution to global buffs!

desc1.trans: Počas obdobia podujatia sa pečené morčacie mäso zriedka spadnú z upratovania a robota AKF na všetkých úrovniach
desc1.eng: During event period, Roasted Turkey will drop rarely from scavenging and AKF Bot on all levels

desc2.trans: Keď sa konzumuje pečená morka, získate +20% exp na úlohy AFK po dobu 20 minút
desc2.eng: When a Roasted Turkey is consumed, you will get +20% EXP on AFK tasks for 20 minutes

footnote1.trans: Vezmite prosím na vedomie, že kontrola bonusu EXP je v čase dokončenia AFK, takže na prijatie bonusu musíte mať pražený morčací buff aktívny.
footnote1.eng: Please note that the EXP bonus check is at AFK completion time, so you must have the Roasted Turkey buff active at the time of completion to receive the bonus.

footnote2.trans: Tento efekt sa bude skladať s ďalším bonusom EXP a ovplyvní iba úlohy AFK; Úlohy, ktoré nemajú časovače AFK, nebudú ovplyvnené.
footnote2.eng: This effect will stack with other EXP bonus, and will only affect AFK tasks; tasks that does not have AFK timers will not be affected.

desc.trans: Konzumujte vynikajúcu morku, aby ste získali +${percent}% exp na úlohy AFK
desc.eng: Consume delicious turkey to get +${percent}% EXP on AFK tasks

desc1.trans: Pridaný klaster lekárskych technológií, je možné vypracovať s 1000 častiami lekárskych technológií. Toto sa dá použiť na efektívne ukladanie veľkého množstva diel lekárskych technológií
desc1.eng: Added Medical Tech Cluster, can be crafted with 1000 medical tech parts. this can be use to efficiently store large amount of medical tech parts

desc2.trans: Pridaná špeciálna položka „kazetová páska“, pri použití dostanete nadšenci, ktoré vám poskytnú +20% poškodenie a +20% obranu, jediný spôsob, ako získať túto položku, je denný zväzok zadarmo v ${shopName}
desc2.eng: Added special item "Cassette Tape", when used you will receive buffs that gives you +20% damage and +20% defense, the only way to get this item is daily free bundle in ${shopName}

desc3.trans: Podrobnosti o položke UI prepracované, teraz zdôrazňuje primárne tlačidlo a sekundárne tlačidlá sa zmenili na menšiu veľkosť
desc3.eng: Item details UI redesigned, now it highlights primary button and secondary buttons has been changed to smaller size

desc4.eng: Added a new "${name}" donator chat frame

desc1.trans: Techno -zlodej sa pri otváraní prepraviek zriedka v Dungeone pustí
desc1.eng: Techno Thief will spawn rarely in dungeon when you open crates, they drop better loots, including higher chance of epic items

desc2.trans: Gang Dungeon bude mať šancu splodiť gangovú úlohu, ktorá zahŕňa zabíjanie nepriateľov konkrétnych gangov NPC

description.trans: Zadaj nové meno pre svojho miláčika
description.eng: Enter new name for your pet

description.trans: Správa sa automaticky pošle moderátorom. \ NEPOURIDUJTE POUŽITIE, Spamovanie alebo hrajte so systémom správy
description.eng: Report will be sent to moderators automatically. \nPlease do not misuses, spamming or play with the report system

otherNoText.eng: Report type of "Other" needs a description

noReportType.eng: You need to select a report type

des1.trans: Ahoj! Som Dexter, vývojár tejto hry, a chcel by som vedieť, aké máš zatiaľ skúsenosti.
des1.eng: Hi! I'm Dexter, the developer of this game, and I hope to know your experience so far.

des2.trans: Získaj tieto odmeny za dokončenie prieskumu:
des2.eng: Receive the following rewards for completing the survey:

disclaim.trans: Odmeny dostaneš bez ohľadu na tvoju odpoveď
disclaim.eng: You will receive the rewards regardless of your answer

question1.trans: Máš rád hry, kde môžeš vyhrať zadarmo?
question1.eng: Do you like free to win games?

question2.trans: Ako sa cítiš ohľadom nášho globálneho posilnenia a globálneho preskočenia systému?
question2.eng: How do you feel about our global buff and global skip system?

question3.trans: Koľko hviezdičiek by si hre dal?
question3.eng: How many stars would you rate my game?

feedbackTitle.trans: Prepáč, že to počujem, daj mi vedieť, čo môžem zlepšiť:
feedbackTitle.eng: Sorry to hear that, please let me know what I can improve:

neverShow.trans: Nikdy znova nezobrazovať poznámky k aktualizácii

description.trans: Pozvite ostatných hráčov, aby sa pripojili k vášmu gangu.
description.eng: Invite other players to join your gang.

description.trans: Vykopnite ostatných hráčov z vášho gangu.
description.eng: Kick other players from your gang.

description.trans: Umožnite tomuto hráčovi spravovať povolenie ostatných hráčov
description.eng: Allow this player to manage permission of other players

description.trans: Dovoľte tomuto hráčovi poslať oznámenie všetkým členom gangu
description.eng: Allow this player to send notice to all gang members

inviteCooldown.trans: Tento hráč ste už nedávno pozvali
inviteCooldown.eng: You have already invited this player recently

notInGang.eng: You are not in a gang

notTopGang.trans: Nie ste v hornom gangu. Horné gangy sú: ${topGangs}
notTopGang.eng: You are not in a top gang. Top gangs are: ${topGangs}

text2.trans: Keď finančné prostriedky na kalibráciu dosiahnu 100 %, systém automaticky nasadí +1 až +10 úspešnosť kalibrácie a ochranné buffy proti deštrukcii s intervalom ${deployInterval} minút. Buff vlak sa spustí v nasledujúcom určenom čase
text2.eng: When calibration train funding reaches 100%, the system will automatically deploy +1 to +10 calibration success rate and destruction prevention buffs in sequence with interval of ${deployInterval} minutes. the buff train will starting at the next designated time

discount.trans: Získajte zľavu až ${percent}% pre skorých prispievateľov
discount.eng: Get up to ${percent}% off discount for early contributors

exampleText.trans: Toto je príklad chatovacieho rámca ${tierName} Tier

hint.trans: Môžeš prispieť k celosvetovej párty tým, že si zakúpiš čiastočnú párty. Párty sa začne, keď dosiahne pokrok 100%.
hint.eng: You can contribute to the global party by purchasing a partial party. The party will start when the progress reaches 100%.

discount.eng: Up to ${percent}% off for early contributors

description.trans: Zariadenia s úrovňou rovnaké alebo nižšie ako vybraná vybraná úroveň.
description.eng: Equipments with tier equal or lower than the selected tier selected.

description.trans: Cache s úrovňou rovnaké alebo nižšie ako vybraná vybraná vrstva.
description.eng: Caches with tier equal or lower than the selected tier selected.

permanentDescription.eng: This title will never expire.\nIt stays with your account forever.

inAppPurchaseDescription.trans: Predplatné na základe darovania, môžeš ho kedykoľvek zrušiť vo svojom obchode.
inAppPurchaseDescription.eng: Subscription based donation, you can cancel it at anytime from your store.

title.trans: Zadajte svoj e -mail, systém vám pošle e -mail s resetovým heslom
title.eng: Enter your email, the system will send a reset password email to you

emailSent.trans: E -mail s obnovením hesla bol odoslaný na {email}
emailSent.eng: An password reset email has been sent to {email}

checkEmail.trans: Skontrolujte svoj e -mail a postupujte podľa pokynov, aby ste resetovali heslo
checkEmail.eng: Please check your email and follow the instructions to reset the password

gameplayDesc.trans: Tieto výsledkové tabuľky ukazujú štatistiku hry hráča.💪
gameplayDesc.eng: These leaderboards shows player's gameplay statistics.💪

contributionDesc.trans: Tieto rady ukazujú rešpekt a kredity legendám, ktoré prispeli do komunity .❤
contributionDesc.eng: These boards shows respect and credits to the legends who have contributed to the community.❤️

exceedSlot.trans: ${petName} momentálne býva na ulici kvôli nedostatku miesta vo tvojom byte
exceedSlot.eng: ${petName} is currently living on the street due to lack of space in your apartment

cooldown.trans: Adopcia zvierat je momentálne na odpočinku

noSlot.trans: Na adopciu zvieratka je potrebný byt
noSlot.eng: You need to rent a bigger apartment to accommodate more pets

noItem.eng: You need a ${itemName} to adopt a pet

description.trans: Aktivujte pre povolenie všetkým hráčom prijať si zviera, kým je aktívny buff
description.eng: Activate to allow all players to adopt a pet while buff is active

confirmDescription.trans: Si istý/á, že chceš aktivovať Adoption Buff?
confirmDescription.eng: Are you sure you want to activate the Adoption Buff?

description.trans: V tvojom inventári nie je ${itemName}, stále môžeš aktivovať bonus pre ostatných hráčov, ale bez ${itemName} nebudeš môcť prijímať zvieratá
description.eng: You do not have an ${itemName} in your inventory, you still can activate the buff for other players to benefit, however without ${itemName} you will not be able to adopt pets

description.trans: Neosielajte kozmetiku hráčom, ktorých nepoznáte ani nepoužívate ako súčasť obchodu. Táto funkcia by sa mala používať iba ako darček pre vášho priateľa
description.eng: Do not send cosmetic to players you do not know or use it as part of a trade. this feature should only be used as a gift to your friend

title.trans: Pošlite ${donationName} Frame Darsation Chat Frame (Cena ${price} jednotka) pre prehrávač "${playerName}"?
title.eng: Send ${donationName} donation chat frame (cost ${price} Unit) to player "${playerName}"?

description.trans: Kliknutím na Potvrdenie súhlasíte s tým, že tento kozmetický dar neposielate v rámci obchodu a je to výlučne darček pre vášho priateľa bez očakávaného návratu.
description.eng: By clicking confirm, you agree that you are not sending this cosmetic gift as part of a trade and is purely a gift to your friend with no return expected.

sendSuccessMsg.trans: Úspešne ste odoslali ${donationName} Darný chatovací rám pre prehrávač "${playerName}"

donationDescription.eng: Gifted donation tier last for 30 days

emblemNotIncluded.eng: Emblem is not included in gift

description.trans: Neosielajte kozmetiku hráčom, ktorých nepoznáte ani nepoužívate ako súčasť obchodu. Táto funkcia by sa mala používať iba ako darček pre vášho priateľa
description.eng: Do not send cosmetic to players you do not know or use it as part of a trade. this feature should only be used as a gift to your friend

description.trans: Kliknutím na Potvrdenie súhlasíte s tým, že tento kozmetický dar neposielate v rámci obchodu a je to výlučne darček pre vášho priateľa bez očakávaného návratu.
description.eng: By clicking confirm, you agree that you are not sending this cosmetic gift as part of a trade and is purely a gift to your friend with no return expected.

sendSuccessMsg.eng: You have successfully sent an emblem to player "${playerName}"

cannotCraft.trans: Nemôžete remeselne remeselne, zatiaľ čo nie
cannotCraft.eng: You cannot craft while not idle

aiConnectNotAvailable.trans: Prístup zamietnutý. Slanc nie je pripojený k chatovaniu
aiConnectNotAvailable.eng: Permission Denied. SLANC not connected to chat

cannotSend.trans: Tento hráč teraz nemôže dostať darček
cannotSend.eng: This player cannot receive gift now

mail.trans: ${event} Top -up odmena ${items} bola odoslaná do vašej doručenej pošty
mail.eng: ${event} top up reward ${items} has been sent to your inbox

itemGlobalCooldown.trans: Tento predmet je na globálnom cooldown-e, musíte počkať ${seconds} sekúnd, kým ho budete môcť znova použiť
itemGlobalCooldown.eng: This item is on global cooldown, you must wait ${seconds} seconds before using this item again

cannotUseItemInStatus.trans: Túto položku nemôžete použiť, pretože existuje stavový efekt, ktorý s ňou je v rozpore
cannotUseItemInStatus.eng: You cannot use this item because there is a status effect that conflicts with it

alreadyInteracted.eng: You have already interacted with this

successv2.trans: Úspešne ste aktivovali konzolu replikátora a získali ste ${effectName} na ${minutes} minút
successv2.eng: You have successfully activated the Replicator Console and received ${effectName} for ${minutes} minutes

deleteWhileMuted.trans: Keď ste tlmení, nemôžete odstrániť svoj účet.
deleteWhileMuted.eng: You can't delete your account when you are muted.

deleteAccountTooEarly.trans: Tento účet teraz nemôžete odstrániť, počkajte pár dní
deleteAccountTooEarly.eng: You can't delete this account now, please wait a few days

cantPerformAction.eng: You can't perform this action during party buff

invalidTravelLink.trans: Neplatný cestovný odkaz, ak pretrvávajte, znova načítajte
invalidTravelLink.eng: Invalid Travel Link, if persist please reload

recipeDisabled.trans: Tento recept momentálne nie je k dispozícii
recipeDisabled.eng: This recipe is currently not available

failed.trans: Nepodarilo sa vám uniknúť, šanca na úspech: ${chance}%
failed.eng: You failed to escape, success chance: ${chance}%

levelTooHigh.trans: Vaša úroveň je príliš vysoká na vykonanie tejto akcie tu, skúste to urobiť v ďalšej zóne.
levelTooHigh.eng: Your level is too high to perform this action here, try to do it in the next zone.

mail.trans: Ďakujeme za vyplnenie prieskumu, odmeny boli odoslané do tvojej položkovej schránky, ktorú môžeš nájsť v záložke inventára
mail.eng: Thank you for completing the survey, the rewards have been sent to your item inbox, you can access the inbox from the inventory tab
You have received a street cred from ${playerName}

success.eng: You have given daily street cred.

notEnoughLevelError.trans: Musíte byť úroveň 10 alebo viac, aby ste dali hráčovi ulicu kredit
notEnoughLevelError.eng: You must be level 10 or above to give player street cred

cooldownError.trans: Zatiaľ nemôžete dať pouličnému kreditu (raz za každý deň)
cooldownError.eng: You cannot give street cred yet (once every day)

nameUsed.trans: Tento názov používa iný hráč, použite iné meno
nameUsed.eng: this name is used by other player, please use other name

reservedKeyword.trans: Tento názov obsahuje vyhradené zloženia, použite iné meno
reservedKeyword.eng: This name contains reserved wordings, please use other name

nameProfane.trans: Tento názov obsahuje formulácie, ktoré nie sú povolené, použite iné meno
nameProfane.eng: This name contains wordings not allowed, please use other name

nameInvalid.trans: Dĺžka názvu musí byť väčšia ako 4, menej ako alebo rovná 16 a obsahuje iba anglické znaky, čísla alebo \ '_ \'
nameInvalid.eng: name length must be greater then 4, less then or equal to 16 and only contains English characters, numbers or \'_\'

notEnoughUnit.trans: Nemáš dosť jednotiek na pridanie sa k kalibračnému vlaku
notEnoughUnit.eng: You do not have enough Unit to join calibration train

alreadyActive.trans: Kalibračný tréning je už aktívny, počkaj, kým skončí
alreadyActive.eng: Calibration train is already active, please wait til it ends

successMail.trans: Kalibrácia, na ktorej si sa podieľal, bola úspešne aktivovaná. Komunita ti ďakuje za tvoj príspevok!
successMail.eng: The calibration you contributed in has been successfully activated, the community thank you for your contribution!

contribute.trans: ${playerName} prispel k pokroku kalibračného tréningu, daj legendárke trochu uličného štýlu! [aktuálny fond: ${percent}%] ${cred}
contribute.eng: ${playerName} has contributed to calibration train progress, give the legend some street cred! [current fund: ${percent}%] ${cred}

notEnoughUnit.trans: Nemáš dosť jednotiek na pridanie sa do globálnej skupiny
notEnoughUnit.eng: You do not have enough Unit to join global party

alreadyActive.trans: Celosvetová párty už prebieha, počkaj, kým sa skončí
alreadyActive.eng: Global party is already active, please wait til it ends

contribute.trans: ${playerName} prispel k celosvetovému pokroku párty, daj tej legende trochu uličného kreditu! [aktuálny fond: ${percent}%] ${cred}
contribute.eng: ${playerName} has contributed to global party progress, give the legend some street cred! [current fund: ${percent}%] ${cred}

1.trans: Dostali ste „preskočenie znaku 1“ za to, že máte body ${amount} preskočenie
1.eng: You have received "Skip Emblem 1" for having ${amount} skip points

2.trans: Dostali ste „preskočenie Emblem 2“ za to, že máte ${amount} preskočné body
2.eng: You have received "Skip Emblem 2" for having ${amount} skip points

3.trans: Dostali ste „preskočenie Emblem 3“ za to, že máte body ${amount} preskočenie
3.eng: You have received "Skip Emblem 3" for having ${amount} skip points

4.trans: Dostali ste „${frameName}“ Darný chatovací rámec za to, aby ste mali ${amount} preskočné body
4.eng: You have received "${frameName}" donator chat frame for having ${amount} skip points

announcement.trans: ${playerName} použila globálny čas preskočenia času, všetci online hráči, ktorí momentálne vykonávajú úlohu AFK (${playerCount} prehrávač), automaticky preskočia na ${skipTime} minúty. Dajte legende nejaké kredity? ${credButton}
announcement.eng: ${playerName} has used Global Time Skip, all online players currently performing AFK task (${playerCount} players) will automatically time skip by ${skipTime} minutes. Give the legend some creds? ${credButton}

firstTimeAnnouncement.trans: ${playerName} prvýkrát použil Globálny Časový Preskok, poďme sa poďakovať novému skiperovi ${playerName}🛐🛐! ${credButton}
firstTimeAnnouncement.eng: ${playerName} has used Global Time Skip for the first time, let's give some thanks to the new skipper ${playerName}🛐🛐! ${credButton}

success.trans: ${player} aktivoval/a bezpečnostný buff kalibrácie, neúspešná kalibrácia nebude mať za následok zničenie predmetu, kým je buff aktívny. Daj tejto legende trochu ulice! ${cred}
success.eng: ${player} has activated calibration safety buff, failed calibration will not result in destruction of the item while buff is active, give this legend some street cred! ${cred}

invalidType.trans: Typ buffu, ktorý sa snažíš aktivovať, nie je zhodný so serverom, uisti sa, že čas na tvojom zariadení je správny
invalidType.eng: The buff type you are trying to activate is inconsistent with server, please ensure your device time is correct

notEnoughUnit.trans: Nemáš dosť jednotiek na aktiváciu tohto bonusu, potrebuješ: ${amount}
notEnoughUnit.eng: You do not have enough Unit to activate this buff, require: ${amount}

notAllowed.trans: Nemožno aktivovať, pretože kalibračný tréning sa chystá začať alebo už začal
notAllowed.eng: Cannot activate because Calibration Train is about to start or has started

success.trans: ${player} aktivoval kalibračný buff, šanca na úspech sa zvýšila o ${percent}, daj tejto legende trochu ulice! ${cred}
success.eng: ${player} has activated calibration buff, success chance increased by ${percent}, give this legend some street cred! ${cred}
